Package nzilbb.encoding

Class SAMPA2DISC

  • Object
    • PhonemeTranslator
      • SAMPA2DISC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<String,​String>, UnaryOperator<String>
    public class SAMPA2DISC
extends PhonemeTranslator
    Translates SAMPA-encoded phonemic transcriptions like tSeIndZ to CELEX-DISC-encoded transcriptions like J1n_.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz
    See Also:
    DISC2SAMPA
